  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="8441" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="8441" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.07</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="5100">5,100</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="244"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>La Tulipe</b> by <b>Byredo</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>La Tulipe</b> was launched in 2010. La Tulipe was created by Jrme Epinette and Ben Gorham. Top notes are Freesia, Cyclamen and Rhuburb; middle note is pink tulip; base notes are Green Notes, Vetyver and Woodsy Notes. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>La Tulipe was presented in 2010 as a fresh and clean floral fragrance with top notes of rhubarb, cyclamen and freesia. A heart incorporates floral notes of tulip, while a base finishes with greenery, blond wood and vetiver. The fragrance can be purchased as 100ml edp.</p>

<p>La Tulipe is built around the idea of the tulip - a flower reminiscent of morning moist gardens and by being one of the season's first flowers to open its bud; the tulip has become a symbol for the rebirth of spring.</p>

<p>"I have always loved tulips and decided to create a fragrance that spoke of the whole idea of the flower. To do this I wanted to capture its shy characteristic - and combine that with the expressive physicality it bears."  Ben Gorham</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a href="https://www.fragrantica.es/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html" target="_blank"                     </div>
                    </div>
                    Strong detergent/soapy opening
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                            <span>

                        </div>
                        <div class="vote-box-sp-ai">
                             <span>
                            <i class="far fa-thumbs-down"></i>
                             </span>
                            <div class="num-votes-sp"><span style="font-size: 0.8rem;">24</span></div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                    </div>
                    Does not smell like tulips
                </div>
                            <div class="cell small-12" style="display: inline-flex; margin: 0.4rem;word-wrap: break-word;padding: 0 0.6rem 0 0.6rem;">
                    <div class="fa-lg" style="display: flex; align-items: center; color: grey; cursor: pointer;">
                    <div style="display: inline-flex;">

                    Smells like cheap air freshener to some

</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.222.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tulip-222.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>pink tulip</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.318.jpg" style="width: 4.3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Green-Notes-318.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Green Notes</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75965265410792; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.2.jpg" style="width: 2.6rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vetiver-2.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vetyver</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.315.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Woody-Notes-315.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Woodsy Notes</div></div></div>

</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="8441"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.94</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="8441"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>2.09</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4" v-pre>

<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2369372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2369372" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2369372ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2369372" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2079916">Perfume&amp;BeautyCollector87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-03">12/03/24 09:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very fresh creamy floral scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2369372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2369372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2357995" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2357995" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bleach070805"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2289812.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bleach070805" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Avon/Today-Tomorrow-Always-The-Moment-Her-76375.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76375.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Today Tomorrow Always The Moment Her"title="Today Tomorrow Always The Moment Her"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2357995ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2357995" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2289812">bleach070805</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-22">11/22/24 15:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>this is kind of a magical fragrance but it really does not suit my body chemistry. i've never smelled such a wonderful tulip fragrance without any of those other annoying and overbearing floral notes they tend to put with fragrances like this (patchouli, jasmine, lily of the valley etc). it smells straight up like tulips. and the green note is super interesting, like it's the stems of the tulips and the water in the vase the cut flowers are stood in. however something about this pulls really sickly and disgusting on my skin. i think it's the combination of green notes and rhubarb? the latter is extremely sour on me and it is not pleasant.. i was hoping to try and find a creamy base to make this scent a little sweeter but no luck so far as everything i've tried just muddles the beautiful blend of this perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2357995"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2357995#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353631" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WitchQueen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="WitchQueen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1735970">WitchQueen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 19:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is one of the best fragrances I've ever smelled, easily a 10/10 scent. However it lasts for less than an hour. Maybe I'll try the oil.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2353631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2353631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2338936" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2338936" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AnniePruana"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1981838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1981838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AnniePruana" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-Dusita/Splendiris-54863.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54863.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Splendiris"title="Splendiris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2338936ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2338936" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1981838">AnniePruana</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-05">11/05/24 10:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a fairy moss green surrounded by twinkling lights found after a long  trail to a magical place only experiencing it can describe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2338936"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2338936#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2331755" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2331755" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bordo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276236"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1276236.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bordo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gallagher-Fragrances/Wicked-Good-53950.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.53950.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wicked Good"title="Wicked Good"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2331755ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2331755" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276236">Bordo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 14:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a super beautiful, fresh and clean scent. It feels so relevant, despite being released in 2010. Perfectly fitted for clean girl aesthetics and I am not surprised it is super popular among K-Pop starts. It is light, careless, pretty, clean and radiates perfection. At the same performance is outstanding - such light fresh scent with such long lasting power and sillage. I can totally feel this scent throughout entire day. As for notes, I would not say it smells particularly like tulips, to me tulips have almost plasticky feel (hard to describe, hope you know what I mean). Nor it is truly green or herbal - I'm not a fan of wearing such scents... Overall it is clean floral, leaning towards soap but in the best way possible. Like I want to smell clean and nice like a soap and not just any soap, but this perfect soap. It also has some aquatic quality to it, if I hadn't seen the notes, I'd guess there is some lotus in the blend. Overall, I totally recommend this one, especially for people like me, who like the idea of such pretty clean fresh scents but do not go for them because they are often associated with poor longevity or weir musks. La Tulipe is totally something else </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2331755"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2331755#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

Just doesn't last at all, after 90 minutes it's gone. Waaayyyy too overpriced for what you get.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2283591"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2283591#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264912" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264912" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="helenearne"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1458178"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1458178.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="helenearne" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Le-Labo/Lys-41-18382.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18382.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lys 41"title="Lys 41"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264912ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264912" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); Green, earthy and floral. I wore it as my wedding scent!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2264912"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2264912#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243724" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-09">08/09/24 06:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>MBTI: ISFJ, ISTJ<br />
<br />
It's essentially an exquisite floral scented detergent/ fabric softener mixed with a delicate floral lady perfume. Smells clean , like the old fashioned fancy soap you gran would rub you down with as a kid.<br />
<br />
It's elegant, modern and soapy. <br />
Perfect for summer.<br />
Kinda meh/feels wrong for winter.<br />
<br />
Good to spray yourself with after a night out to feel a bit put together again. <br />
</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2243724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2243724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2242985" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2242985" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mlepnos"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352234"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mlepnos" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2242985ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2242985" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1352234">Mlepnos</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 13:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this scent but unfortunately it performs quite weakly (which perhaps is intended due to its minimalistic approach) and doesnt last long. Gone after about 2-3 hours. Honestly not worth the price tag. I would rather go for Florabotanica which however sadly is discontinued. Another scent that I would rather recommend which isnt discontinued is Nymphessence by Roos &amp; Roos. Its absolutely not the same scent or that similar to la tulipe but it has the same approach imo and you get more bang for the buck, despite it being a bit more pricey as well. All in all, la tulipe is delightful but excessively overpriced for what it is.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2242985"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2242985#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2240556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2240556" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sootysalters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1818216.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sootysalters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2240556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2240556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1818216">sootysalters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-06">08/06/24 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh cut tulips through and through. Encapsulates the colour green. LOVE</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2240556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2240556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239109" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2239109" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Florind"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/835858"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.835858.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Florind" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2239109ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2239109" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); <br />
 top - white flower with green stem + pinky spice(pepper?)<br />
<br />
middle - metallic white + pinky spice(pepper?)<br />
<br />
last - silvery fish</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2239109"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2239109#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2238045" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2238045" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="verzosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/239364"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.239364.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="verzosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Galop-d-Hermes-39584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Galop d'Hermes"title="Galop d'Hermes"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2238045ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2238045" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/239364">verzosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-03">08/03/24 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I get dainty vibes from this perfume. It has a minimalistic quality and it's exactly what the name entails. The accords don't say that it's fresh, but I find it to be mostly that. La Tulipe is a heavily clean floral without being too much. I imagine it matches well for someone who aims to achieve a clean aesthetic.<br />
<br />
A delightfully linear perfume I've come to like over time.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2238045"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2238045#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216672" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DariaFrancesca74"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1537588.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DariaFrancesca74" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216672ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216672" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1537588">DariaFrancesca74</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 13:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, intense floral fragrance at the opening, with an almost rarefied harmless temporal olfactory evolution. Undoubtedly a floral bouquet that recalls the freshness of cut flowers, ready to be placed in a decorative composition. Freesia, rhubarb and green notes are dominant in the entire olfactory experience which slowly fades away leaving a light, very delicate scent on the skin. I recommend it for lovers of impalpable florals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2216672"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2216672#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2216559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2216559" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="franciscrawford"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/242539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.242539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="franciscrawford" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Florabloom-89854.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89854.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Florabloom"title="Aqua Allegoria Florabloom"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2216559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2216559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/242539">franciscrawford</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 11:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Starts cool, fresh, flowery, creamy with hints of cut stems, very much like the spirit of a flower bouquet pulled from the florist fridge, and almost immediately becomes a cloying synthetic powdery dryer sheet that clogs the throat and causes an instant headache. Wish the opening could be the entire scent because that's lovely (which is why I foolishly bought it), but the heart and the base do not do it justice. I own a full bottle so I keep coming back to it to see if my opinion has changed but sadly no. If you like powder bombs and laundry detergent, you'll enjoy this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2216559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2216559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2202918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061554">Nicola_Six</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-26">05/26/24 15:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The initial spray is fresh flowers with all its greenery - a beautiful, clean and refreshing scent. Over its short lifespan the green mellows out and the smell of fresh flowers takes over. Then it disappears almost completelysigh. I like La Tulipe, and it would be love and FBW but for the poor longevity; within 2-3 hours it is a skin scent that I really have to mash my nose into my skin to smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153201" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="giabao2503"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557588"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="giabao2503" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153201ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153201" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1557588">giabao2503</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-11">05/11/24 20:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>underrated fragrance indeed. La Tulipe is simplicity, none-offensive and delicate. No one on youtube talks about this beauty, yet I find it is perfectly balance for upcoming evening date. Not only the tulipe  the note the scent overall has this smooth, clean and velvet feeling like flower's petals. 8/10 solid (vietnam summer is just too hot ~40C degree now )</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2153201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2153201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2141642" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is like walking into your favorite florist shop and picking up a gorgeous pink and white bouquet breathing in the flowers - stems and all. Close to the skin and doesnt last too too long so must be re-sprayed. Not inexpensive but if you at looking for something to take you from spring to summer this one is it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2141642"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2141642#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110809" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I like this a lot better than Insolence and wild bluebell this has a much youthful clean vibe than the two others scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2110809"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2110809#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2108561" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very unoffensive, office friendly perfume. It smells like hair shampoo. <br />
Projection and longevity could be better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2092567"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2092567#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2088756" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Gilsan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/629292"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.629292.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Gilsan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/Aqua-Allegoria-Mandarine-Basilic-2060.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2060.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Aqua Allegoria Mandarine Basilic"title="Aqua Allegoria Mandarine Basilic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2088756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2088756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/629292">Gilsan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-11">03/11/24 02:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful floral. Smells so good on other people! But for me it gives me a headache and affects my asthma. So if you are like me I would go with Mojave ghost instead.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2088756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2088756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073594" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073594" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Heliotrope72"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1951661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Heliotrope72" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Rehab/Choco-Musk-20139.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.20139.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Choco Musk"title="Choco Musk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073594ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073594" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1951661">Heliotrope72</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 08:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rating: <br />
Do I like it: Not really, the drydown kills my fun<br />
Who it is: A basic woman in her 20s that got caught up in the trad wife lifestyle and now secretly deeply regrets it <br />
Smells I get: floral-green-sweet mix, crushed leaves, Lenor fabric softener, aldehydes<br />
Meyer's Briggs type: ESFJ<br />
<br />
Thought it would be my favourite from the discovery set, ended up being a hard pass from me. An another wonderful offering from Byredo that inspires me only to save my money. <br />
<br />
It opens wonderfully and sweetly, enveloping the wearer in sweet undefined floral smells, after which the green bits come into interplay, smelling like a cut-up house plant, specifically Griselinia. It's quite a pleasant green-sweet smell, might even get someone into buying it.<br />
<br />
 However... from heart to the drydown, the fragrance turns weak and soapy. Soapy meaning diving in a pool of fabric softener - the smell of acetone and dove soap mixed with a lot of powdery musk and aldehydes. It's not only mediocre, but moreover headache inducing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2073594"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2073594#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064140" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064140" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kpop_stan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543675.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kpop_stan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064140ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064140" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543675">kpop_stan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-16">02/16/24 08:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This one was a pleasant surprise! I actually wanted to test Rose of No Man's Land but the bottle was empty, so I sniffed around what else the store had (not a Byredo boutique unfortunately so selection was limited), liked this and gave it a spritz. Didn't know anything about it other than, obviously, tulip, and going in blind I interpreted this as citrusy, floral and clean, almost aldehyde-like but not quite. More "clean linens" than "soap". This smells how I wanted/expected Bal d'Afrique to smell! <br />
<br />
This is a LOVE, but I won't be running out to buy it as I already have Sundazed and while they're very different perfumes they sort of fill the same role as a citrussy uplifting spring/summer scent. I like Sundazed a lot more, but I wouldn't be surprised if I grow tired of it by the time I finish the bottle, so I anticipate myself hopping over to this one for a change of pace. :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2064140"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2064140#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2061308" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2061308" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scent.guide"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1406103.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scent.guide" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2061308ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2061308" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1406103">Scent.guide</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-13">02/13/24 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I can feel lots of different flowers (such as mimosa, hyacinth and lilac). They give a very fresh (and quite powdery) floral vibe which easily can be somewhat kind of tulip scent for sure. Ultimately its a nice green floral and even slightly aquatic perfume.<br />
<br />
Follow me on IG: scent.guide</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2061308"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2061308#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2044691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2044691" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ariete76"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190594"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1190594.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ariete76" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2044691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2044691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1190594">Ariete76</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-28">01/28/24 08:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wonderful scent I will NEVER get tired of saying it! A fresh ethereal herbaceous floral, pure spring! When I wear it it evokes a fresh garden of soft green country flowers, the rhubarb binds very well with the essence of the pink tulip, and seems to dance with the other fresh flowers such as freesia and cyclamen, I actually don't feel the base notes minimally, to my nose it always manages to emanate a riot of green floral freshness and I must say that I love it for this too! If we really want to find a sore point it is the very low duration for me, in reality almost all the Byredo perfumes that I own unfortunately lack longevity, but for this perfume I can even turn a blind eye!<br />
<br />
<br />
Correction:<br />
Using it constantly I can't tell you if it's due to awareness or hormonal changes etc. the longevity of this wonderful perfume has changed, it really lasts a long time on my skin, I can smell it for most of the day, it is certainly not a longevity bomb but much more than what I mentioned in the first description, for me never without it again!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1404005">Cherry Bloom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 12:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is how I expected the overhyped Chance Eau Tendre would smell like. That one has smth disturbing for me but this...oh, my my .. initially, I perceive it so powdery, i said "no" and passed over. However, in about a quater of an hour it turns into the most beautiful, delicate, pure floral perfume. It looks like it's so hard to create a simple, pure floral. But La Tulipe made it. A masterpiece in its simplicity. Such a pity it flees from my wrist 2/3 hours later...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2019053"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2019053#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2017296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2017296" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="janiefmc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876187"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1876187.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="janiefmc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2017296ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2017296" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876187">janiefmc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 18:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This has that same watery green dew drop note (that I think some people pick up as cucumber) as Jo Malone's Wild Bluebell and about the same longevity (which is to say not much). It's slightly more floral, slightly less fruity, and overall a refreshing dewy sweet option that's just... nice. Gentle, quiet, feminine, springy, and fleeting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2017296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2017296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015017" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I'm not usually a fan of green florals, but the way it's balanced with the gentle tulip is lovely. It also smells super similar to a Korean body mist called So Hee: On Hope. Gorgeous for Spring and defo can be worn all year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2015017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2015017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2013684" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I will always have to repurchase it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2013684"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2013684#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2003628" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2003628" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ground hound"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1589008.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ground hound" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Iris-Shot-54869.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54869.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Iris Shot"title="Iris Shot"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2003628ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2003628" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589008">Ground hound</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-17">12/17/23 11:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Laundry-clean, office-friendly, green and floral, slightly sweet, not bitter/watery, but not too sweet either, (not a gourmand situation at all).<br />
Something from the universe of Cow by Zoologist, Blanche by Byredo, Drop d`Issey by Issey Miyake (yes, this is not lilac but the same ~floral laundry~ profile).<br />
As mentioned by others not sure what kind of "soft spices" are mentioned, coz it`s a clean green scent with no spices whatsoever.<br />
Safe, floral, laundry-like, green, mostly linear, quite minimalistic.<br />
I either love or hate Byredo`s perfumes but this one is really a crowd pleaser. I cannot find any faults with this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="2003628"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=2003628#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996933" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996933" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spaceybailey"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1800427"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1800427.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="spaceybailey" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996933ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996933" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); It's feminine, fresh, clean and very COZY. Not a warm perfume but it makes you feel some type of way. Very comforting I would say. If you like BLANCHE but you find it too powdery, try this one. This is Blanche's BABY sis. She's sweet and just as beautiful. It smells like, fresh strawberries, candied tulips, aloe juice and "just cut" fresh WOOD. An everyday, signature worthy, type of perfume. Perfect for cold weather, day to night. BISOUS</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1996933"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1996933#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972348" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
