align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1749626"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1749626#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1743300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1743300" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ChanelNotes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670460"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1670460.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ChanelNotes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Sex-Bomb-60028.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60028.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sex Bomb"title="Sex Bomb"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1743300ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1743300" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670460">ChanelNotes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-25">01/25/23 14:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you want a cheaper dupe, look no further than the Jo Malone x Zara collab called Boldly Seoul.<br />
<br />
I got a decant of this and as soon as I sprayed it, I knew I knew that scent. I kept bothering me until I realized it was Boldly Seoul which is one of my 2 favs from the Jo Malone/Zara collab "Vibrant Cities"<br />
<br />
Im very surprised by the absence of violet in the notes because that is the first thing you smell. Truly floral. I love Boldly Seoul so I do like this, I wouldnt mind spraying both together, maybe that would help their longevity because both are pretty poor in the department. The Zara version has a wider sillage and lasts a bit longer than Byredo but not by much.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1743300"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1743300#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1737937" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1737937" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Annelieva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646801"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1646801.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Annelieva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jo-Malone-London/Red-Roses-5484.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5484.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Red Roses"title="Red Roses"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1737937ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1737937" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646801">Annelieva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-19">01/19/23 06:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful, beautiful, beautiful! I ordered samples of this and Delina online, and Im now wearing them on opposite wrists. Wow. This knocks the socks of Delina! This is a very realistic flower scent. It doesnt exactly smell like Tulips, but more of a bouquet of different flowers. Not sharp, but soft, clean and creamy. I dont think its grandma-like at all, because grandma smells are more sharp and strong, in my opinion. To me a grandma-perfume is Chanel number 5, Boucheron and so on, because that was what the grannies in the eighties used to wear and reek of. I still remember the feeling of being choked by their perfumes as a child. Im already in love with Byredos Lil Fleur and Rose of no mans land so I have to say Im very impressed by this perfume house! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1737937"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1737937#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1734176" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1734176" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jmalone84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/912651"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.912651.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jmalone84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mugler/Angel-704.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.704.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Angel"title="Angel"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1734176ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1734176" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/912651">Jmalone84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-14">01/14/23 18:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So the burst of fresh green florals is strong for about 10 seconds but then quickly fades to what smells like cardomom to me. I can take it or leave it really. Doesnt last overly long.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1734176"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1734176#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1722377" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1722377" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Shui-Xian"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1541621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Shui-Xian" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versatile-Paris/Accrodisiaque-78636.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.78636.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Accrodisiaque"title="Accrodisiaque"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1722377ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1722377" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541621">Shui-Xian</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-01">01/01/23 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume is an instatnt transfer to the flowery shop. Pure, innocent, gentle. The composition smells very natural and captivating - as the flowers we know. <br />
<br />
Fresia is dominant but I appriciate a green notes. Rhuburb is fruity and sour a little so the fragrance is not too sweet or cloying. It is not too soapy or powdery either: more like an essence of water drops on blooms...<br />
<br />
I really like it. This perfume has a noble standard and doesn't lack an esprit. <br />
It is modest in its simplicity but the scent is truely charming.<br />
<br />
Pity about longevity and sillage.  Neither is barely moderate.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1722377"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1722377#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1713606" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1713606" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CarnationCelt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1619341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CarnationCelt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1713606ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1713606" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1619341">CarnationCelt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-20">12/20/22 13:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do like it. I actually really like it. The florals are well-chosen, the mix of notes is pitch-perfect, the overall scent is fresh and pleasant...<br />
<br />
...but I just cannot shake the granny vibe. Well, that's not entirely fair - a woman in her mid-forties would also wear this and probably receive some compliments at the next parent-teacher conference. But it's certainly not modern, put it that way. I'm sad to say that it definitely suffers from that symptom common to floral fragrances: dated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1713606"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1713606#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1678654" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538622">CamillaAre</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-01">11/01/22 10:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a realistic floral, like when you walk into a flower shop. The scent is SO beautiful, my only trouble is the performance -  disappears after 4 hours on my skin. Its not very unique IMO so I dont think its worth the money. <br />
I dont normally re-apply during the day but this one needs it.<br />
I dont smell the rhubarb or the woody notes. For me, the dry down leans to musk, bergamot and green, like clean warm sheets in a flower garden heated by the sun. Im surprised that bergamot or citrus is not listed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1678654"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1678654#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1670810" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very realistic floral, very classy &amp; high end. Only downside besides the high price is it doesnt last very long on the skin.  Otherwise this could well have become my signature but cant justify spending this much on one fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1670810"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1670810#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1668228" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1668228" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Laurentik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583750"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Laurentik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1668228ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1668228" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1583750">Laurentik</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-17">10/17/22 16:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very nostalgic sent. The powdery creamy talc notes reminds me of a mother that has just bathed her baby and still has some of the soap and baby powder on her hands. The tulips come out in the dry down rounding out a fresh and floral inoffensive sent. I really like this one but the sillage is not great for the price point. This is a fragrance that needs to be a little less intimate. You will have to carry a rollerball to reapply throughout the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1668228"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1668228#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1639554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1639554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1639554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1637808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1637808" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seafoamsky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="seafoamsky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1637808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1637808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1564747">seafoamsky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-04">09/04/22 02:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>- Fresh, soapy, clean and pure floral scent <br />
- Reminds me of a sunny, spring day near the garden<br />
- The floral is not overpowering or heavy/thick- rather light and fresh<br />
- Could see this scent working well as a laundry detergent scent? In the best way possible<br />
- within the fresh soapy floral, you also get a hint of powdery-ness<br />
- can see a lot of people in their 20-30s enjoying this perfume <br />
- a perfume I reach for first if I cant decide what to spray <br />
- longevity could be better! A perfume you would have to carry around or better to have the roll on to retouch up the scent<br />
- overall, a clean floral you cant go wrong with. Definitely one of my faves from byredo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1637808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1637808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631708" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="matildavln"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1550532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1550532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="matildavln" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1550532">matildavln</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-26">08/26/22 05:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This perfume honestly smells like a dream really nostalgic for some reason. I hardly get any green note on my skin but it definitely becomes more woody in the dry down. <br />
Beautiful floral scent that just as others have stated before me smells like a flower field in the spring. This is also such a clean and elegant fragrance 100% work appropriate and much more refined and less sharp than Blanche is to be honest.<br />
One of my favourites from Byredo.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1631708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1631708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1628551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1628551" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drinadr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1477755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drinadr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-68-73990.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73990.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '68"title="Cheirosa '68"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1628551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1628551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477755">drinadr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-21">08/21/22 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite the fact that I enjoy floral fragrances, this was not for me. This perfumehas a very strong, almost detergent soapy opening, followed by white freesia and tulip notes. However, the delightful floral scent does not last longand is quickly replaced by a very strong green scent. If you know what I mean, it smells more like atulip leaf and stem than atulip flower. Also, the price is far too high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1628551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1628551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1621360" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Thank me later!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1621360"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1621360#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1598175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1598175" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mklouise24"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1135354"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1135354.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mklouise24" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Paris-Venise-49696.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49696.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Paris  Venise"title="Paris  Venise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1598175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1598175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1135354">mklouise24</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-07">07/07/22 00:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im not the best at describing perfumes so I apologize in advance for my review.  but for me, the best way I can describe this perfume, is like Marc Jacobs Eau So Fresh and Sarah Jessica Parker Lovely had a baby. At first sniff, it smells like Eau Fresh, and the dry down smells like Lovely.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1598175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1598175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1595416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1595416" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BerryRose"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1216775"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1216775.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BerryRose" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1595416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1595416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1216775">BerryRose</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-02">07/02/22 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My very first Byredo purchase was the body wash version of La Tulipe, and every time I used it in the shower I thought to myself "one day..." <br />
<br />
La Tulipe is a lovely floral perfume, it would be a very safe buy for someone who wears florals. Tulips themselves have no smell, but as other reviewers have commented, La Tulipe is very photorealistic in that it smells like a mixed bouquet or a flower shop, giving it a nostalgic quality. However, because it's so realistic it doesn't have a lot of character. I own several other green florals that have a very pretty, feminine quality that makes me think of the Royal Ascot or spring garden parties, whereas I can't think of any other way to describe La Tulipe beyond green, verdant, or photorealistic. I don't regret the purchase, and the packaging and bottle are lovely (this brand is well suited to gift giving if you have the budget for it) but it's a very straightforward perfume for the price point.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1595416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1595416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1586696" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1586696" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kotikina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1498532.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kotikina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Attar-Collection/Khaltat-Night-38133.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38133.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khaltat Night"title="Khaltat Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1586696ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1586696" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1498532">Kotikina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-18">06/18/22 02:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>How underrated is this photorealistic tulip! It brings me back to childhood, when every lady would get a bunch of crispy fresh tulips for 8th of March, and everything smelled like spring. Scent of hope, cleanliness, and optimism.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1586696"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1586696#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579477" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579477" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NellieD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265940"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1265940.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NellieD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tauer-Perfumes/Sundowner-70275.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70275.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sundowner"title="Sundowner"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579477ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579477" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1265940">NellieD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-07">06/07/22 08:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A well-balanced, interesting composition with excellent projection and longevity. The notes in this are not to my taste (all I pick up in the base is ebanol and white musk, two things I don't love), so it's a hard pass for me, but this would be an incredible perfume and well worth the money for someone whose tastes are better aligned with the notes. Fantastic take on femininity with the delicate cyclamen and tulip serving as a sheer veil over the earthier, more grounded, woody base.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1579477"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1579477#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Less the smell of a bouquet of tulips and more the smell of a large, dark hedgemaze if tulips grew on hedges</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1578042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1578042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1574753" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1574753" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JennyNoBull"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1510174"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1510174.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JennyNoBull" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Henry-Rose/Queens-Monsters-59218.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59218.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Queens & Monsters"title="Queens & Monsters"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1574753ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1574753" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1510174">JennyNoBull</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-31">05/31/22 10:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>You know that fresh floral smell of springtime that you wish would last all year? This is it, in a bottle. Obviously tulips don't really have a scent, but this fragrance captures the fresh floral and watery green stem. This is not a powdery fragrance, but watery and wet without being aquatic. I also get the feel of dark, fresh, spring earth with first flowers pushing through. I absolutely adore this fragrance. It's a time, a moment, a feeling.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1574753"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1574753#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1574251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1574251" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thehighpriestess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509705"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1509705.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thehighpriestess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1574251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1574251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1509705">thehighpriestess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-30">05/30/22 16:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very popular in Korea, and I can see why; it's really beautifully floral, but the flowers present don't feel too distinct. It makes me nostalgic for some reason, and while I can't rave about it, I think it's a very safe purchase for a feminine friend or if you want a crowd-pleaser.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1574251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1574251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1573323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1573323" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Violetgoblin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/57036"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.57036.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Violetgoblin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Cirque-du-Soleil/L-eau-de-Parfum-92656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'eau de Parfum"title="L'eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1573323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1573323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/57036">Violetgoblin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-29">05/29/22 08:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spicy, rhubarb infused tulips in the garden. Agree with lovebitch246, was truly hoping for a more green, fresh take. I layer it with Highline. <br />
<br />
Something reminiscent about it from my childhood. I grew up on a large farm and there were gardens; bountiful gardens with those bizarre black, yellow, green catapillers everywhere. Climbing the towering zinnias. The scent of zucchini growing, the leaves that were rough, nearly stinging. Dusty millers. Reminds me, honestly, of 40 years ago and transversing the garden at age 8. I like this fragrance for spring, just not what I was expecting (I adore Inflorescence) but anything that sparks my memory is appreciated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1564882" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Icaruswashere"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1504540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Icaruswashere" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1564882ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1564882" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1504540">Icaruswashere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-16">05/16/22 04:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not very exciting. It's floral and fresh. Bought it for my mom as she loves a good floral wear. To me it smells very elegant and mature, not a very youthful scent. If you're into deep florals you'll love it! It gives what it promises. If you're looking for new exciting scents, this is not the one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1564882"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1564882#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562619" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This is quite literally spring in a bottle.  Im just starting to dabble in florals and this was gifted to me. This isnt the scent profile I typically go for and I gave it away as a Mothers Day present and my mother in law absolutely adores it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1559544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nora Gad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334752"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1334752.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nora Gad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1559544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1559544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334752">Nora Gad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-08">05/08/22 04:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful flowers, very fresh.<br />
I adore it, but the price is expensive.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1559544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1559544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1549183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1549183"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1549183#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1541373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1541373" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="IvoFrag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318905"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1318905.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="IvoFrag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1541373ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1541373" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1318905">IvoFrag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-11">04/11/22 12:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spring has sprung. You are heading to the garden in the middle of the season when flowers have fully bloomed. <br />
La tulipe is spring in a bottle. You get a full blast of white flowers. The headiness of gardenias perhaps, but not listed? Freesia brings some softness to the scent but tulips are undoubtedly the star of the show. Unlike most florals, this one smells incredibly natural and is simply a marvelous and glamorous fragrance. <br />
Genderless by nature. Its for the gentlemen who look forward to the spring to offer flowers to their beloved. Its for the ladies who embrace the season, the florist, and the radiant color of flowers.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1541373"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1541373#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1529438" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ive purchased their fragrance recently which I suspect might be a dupe for this. Overall this is lovely and Ill want a full bottle if the Mustela fragrance doesnt work out for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1509116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1509116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1506574" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1506574" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="michaeld2986"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232773"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1232773.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="michaeld2986" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Carolina-Herrera/CH-Birds-Of-Paradise-For-Him-92688.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92688.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CH Birds Of Paradise For Him"title="CH Birds Of Paradise For Him"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1506574ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1506574" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1232773">michaeld2986</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-17">02/17/22 18:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a guy, I love wearing La Tulipe and I'm not ashamed to say I own a full bottle. I like to layer it with leather or green fragrances. The secret when applying this fragrance is 'less is more' - no more than one spray on the atomizer is enough. Love it!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1506574"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1506574#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1506150" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1506150" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="stacia79"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151903"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.151903.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="stacia79" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1506150ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1506150" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/151903">stacia79</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-17">02/17/22 07:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree the combination of cyclamen and freesia create a smell that is very realistic to real lilac. I used to see Byredo La Tulipe occasionally recommended to people looking for a lilac scent and I never understood why because the listed notes had no lilac. But now I sample it and yes, the first image that sprang to my mind's eye was purple and white lilac bushes in the late spring. I have them growing in my yard and this is precisely the smell. Soft, fresh, purple. I don't know if tulips have a smell other than green, and that is obviously a big part of this perfume too. A very pretty spring floral.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1506150"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1506150#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1504748" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I usually really really really struggle with green+ floral fragrances. Maybe because it's not so in your face (which is pretty much the norm. for Byredo). The body lotion paired with the edp is divine! Worth giving it a try.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1504748"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1504748#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1499916" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1438301">looraw</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-08">02/08/22 00:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was initially lured in to la tulipe based on the mere fact that I love tulips, visually and conceptually, but was suspicious as I dont usually enjoy floral fragrances.<br />
<br />
La tulipe was a very pleasant surprise. A soft, pillowy, full nose kind of floral that brought to mind a warm spring breeze and an enveloping hug from someone loving and maternal. Gentle, but stable. <br />
<br />
As reviewer below stated, my cat also seems to particularly enjoy this fragrance. Strange phenomenon. He has been a purry and snuggly boy ever since I sprayed this on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1499916"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1499916#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1499225" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1499225" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LudkaK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127819"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1127819.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LudkaK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Zimaya/Sharaf-Blend-91883.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91883.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sharaf Blend"title="Sharaf Blend"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1499225ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1499225" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1127819">LudkaK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-07">02/07/22 03:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I asked the shop assistant to spray it on a paper strip on Saturday and on Monday it's still there :-)  I see it at Notino with 10% off as Valentine's discount and I'm seriously considering getting 50 ml bottle. I haven't tested it on my skin but on paper, it's just gorgeous. I agree with other reviewers, it's clean, fresh, floral, gorgeous :-)<br />
<br />
Edit: I finally bought it, full 100 ml bottle and it's a fantastic floral scent, soft but not weak, I'm getting lots of compliments. To my nose, the initial spray is just gorgeous, then later on some green notes pop up that make it a bit harsh but I don't mind. It's not a monster, the lasting power is about 5 - 6 hrs but on clothes, it stays for days. It's a definite love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1499225"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1499225#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1461604" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
