The base notes continue to be pleasant, if somewhat average.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="673284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=673284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent672148" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc672148" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karenqqli"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/677218"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="karenqqli" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma672148ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd672148" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/677218">karenqqli</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-29">01/29/16 01:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried La Tulipe by Byredo in the stall, smell clean and fresh, yet I thought it is too plain.  If anyone have tried French Lime Blossom by Jo Malone, i would say the scent of La Tulipe smells exactly like the former.<br />
<br />
Sillage is moderate and so does longevity.  Not a must buy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="672148"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=672148#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent668584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc668584" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ana hen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/268846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ana hen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Chance-Eau-Tendre-8069.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.8069.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chance Eau Tendre"title="Chance Eau Tendre"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma668584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd668584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/268846">ana hen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-18">01/18/16 15:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tested "tulipe" twice at cold weather and once at very warm April. It much better at cold rainy days - prominent very natural smell of tulips and green juicy leaves.<br />
<br />
<br />
Love it very much,want it terribly (still have too much perfumes)but will maybe buy it for myself at birthday present.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="668584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=668584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent665675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc665675" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fhaldara"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/207962"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.207962.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fhaldara" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Infusion-de-Mimosa-38347.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.38347.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Infusion de Mimosa"title="Infusion de Mimosa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma665675ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd665675" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/207962">Fhaldara</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-09">01/09/16 22:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Oh, this is fantastic! Clean and fresh with a sort of innocence, it captures the non-scented tulip flower to perfection. Neil Morris' Rainflower was always my favorite tulip inspired fragrance, but La Tulipe tops even that. Incredible fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="665675"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=665675#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent665539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc665539" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Emma0714"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/605809"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.605809.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Emma0714" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Olfactive-Studio/Close-Up-40789.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.40789.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Close Up"title="Close Up"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma665539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd665539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/605809">Emma0714</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-01-09">01/09/16 12:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This reminds me alot or a shower gel or shampoo I used to have in the 90's when I was a kid! Can not for my life recall the name of it; but I got the same vibe from No. 07 White Patchouli &amp; Cedarwood from Rituals as well.<br />
<br />
That being said, I think this fragrance is a lovely little creature. It's white, crisp, clean, innocent and almost airy. Like blooming flowers in morning dew somewhere on a mountain. (Imagine that picture on a shower gel bottle)<br />
<br />
I wonder if this is the fragrance Galadriel from Lord of The Rings would wear. It has that elvish-beauty wibe going on.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="665539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=665539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent627298" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc627298" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Escoteric"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/183293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.183293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Escoteric" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Millesime-Imperial-466.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.466.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Millsime Imprial"title="Millsime Imprial"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma627298ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd627298" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/183293">Escoteric</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-09-05">09/05/15 12:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got this after purchasing a bottle of Extreme No.1, by First in Fragrance situated in Germany, (what a disappointment regarding the item I had ordered), I opened the box and thought this is divine, my bottle may have broken,however the learning curve was an expensive one and so was the silver lining attached to the experience. They had enclosed a card with a white down feather with Byredo La Tulipe penned on it. I though wow this box smells superb. I am a bloke and I thought this is absolutely apposite of a fluffy downy, white feather. This is what I guess heaven smells like, fresh clean, and I imagine a white room, with sheer curtains billowing in the wind and spotless cotton bedding. A bowl of calla lilies adorning the dresser, with a jug of ice water. This is clean, clean, fresh. It just states cleanliness is next to godliness. I have to confess if I smelt this on a woman, I would think she is pure and virginal as the driven snow. It would not inflame me or arouse me, just make me think there is more to this person than having a wild time on those white sheets. On a man I think it would make someone think even if you had tattoos and a scar across your face and holding a  bottle of meths and sleeping on the bench, wow thats one well groomed hobo or hard luck case. Its the sort of smell that if the entire bus was empty I would sit right next to the wearer. It is spectacular. Salvation lies in a bottle usually containing alcohol, and this whilst I urge you not to drink its contents, means you are in that ethereal world already. A tattoo is probably cheaper than this and carries less risk of me coming and pestering you on the bus!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="627298"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=627298#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent626338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc626338" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Delila"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/942244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.942244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Delila" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma626338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd626338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/942244">Delila</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-09-02">09/02/15 02:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My goodness, this is outstanding. Feminine, flowery and very sexy.  It's also strong - you won't need much, which is good given the price.<br />
<br />
The only downside for me is that it does not develop or transform with the dry down. I find I get fed up of smelling this initially fantastic perfume on myself. My man does not though - he just continues to enjoy it.<br />
<br />
It also lasts quite a while.  Though when it's gone, it's really gone - it vanishes, leaving no residue.<br />
<br />
Don't let these caveats put you off - they are just FYI.  It's a fabulous quality fragrance with class.<br />
<br />
Follow up:  Others mentioned this smells like Lilac Path by Aerin Lauder.  It does.  I checked them side by side, one on each arm, and they appear identical or extremely close to it.  Lauder might have a fraction more complexity...or that might be my imagination.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="626338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=626338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent625122" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc625122" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Nadia1401"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/775020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Nadia1401" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dries-Van-Noten/Neon-Garden-72595.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72595.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Neon Garden"title="Neon Garden"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma625122ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd625122" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/775020">Nadia1401</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-08-28">08/28/15 12:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells identical to Aerin Lauder's lilac path. Very, very sweet floral, hard to ignore, but pleasant. Very girly though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="625122"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=625122#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent620832" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc620832" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortunista"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/936233"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.936233.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortunista" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Lady-Vengeance-1715.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1715.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lady Vengeance"title="Lady Vengeance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma620832ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd620832" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/936233">Fortunista</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-08-14">08/14/15 17:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The imagery that this scent evokes for me is simply divine. It is what I imagine stepping into a Monet painting smells like... Or Keukenhof: An expansive field of the freshest, most perfect red tulips, experienced on the most perfect spring day. There is a wooden, drafty and clean farmhouse in the middle, and a windmill slowly churning the freshest, lightest air through white linens clung to a line. Truly blissful. I wear this often. It is a top 5 fragrance for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="620832"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=620832#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent615539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc615539" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="beatrix75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39195"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.39195.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="beatrix75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Manifesto-l-Elixir-18785.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.18785.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Manifesto l'Elixir"title="Manifesto l'Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma615539ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd615539" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/39195">beatrix75</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-07-26">07/26/15 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Strong and long lasting fresh dream fragrance .like u walking in a tulip garden in holland  10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="615539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=615539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent594679" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc594679" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="freakypirate"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/822484"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.822484.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="freakypirate" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Soleil-de-Provence-77855.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.77855.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Soleil de Provence"title="Soleil de Provence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma594679ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd594679" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/822484">freakypirate</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-05-14">05/14/15 12:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens with freesia and rhubarb and water notes. Then, crispy notes that remind me of green apples, floral notes and a balsamic undertone. Quite sweet, but also with green notes in the background. From here the scent is pretty linear, the drydown is a bit more soapy but it doesn't change much.   <br />
<br />
Sillage is moderate, longevity moderate to long, quite good!<br />
<br />
This scent doesn't smell like tulips, but gives a lovely impression of spring. Like a watercolor painting of a vase with fresh flowers, colorful and radiant. Too watery for my taste, but this is a good crisp floral.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="594679"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=594679#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="8441" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent874086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc874086" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yzmo91"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/162565"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.162565.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yzmo91" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma874086ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd874086" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/162565">yzmo91</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2017-10-25">10/25/17 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a beautiful clean 'realistic' idea of a floral perfume. It is unpretentious and has a humbling smell, it does not shout. The notes are nicely blended, a safe fragrance and not at all in your face. This is nice if you want to smell something that's natural and uncomplicatedly beautiful. This is the kind of perfume where you appreciate its minimalism.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="874086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=874086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent588302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc588302" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AveParfum"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/35807"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.35807.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AveParfum" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Profumum-Roma/Alba-6967.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6967.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alba"title="Alba"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma588302ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd588302" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/35807">AveParfum</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2015-04-22">04/22/15 17:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Have been wearing La Tulipe all day today, very linear, but I like it a lot!  It is constructed with the perfect balance of tangy and sweet and takes me straight to spring and into early summer with sunshine, green plants, and granny smith apples.  Unlike so many perfumes of this type, it does not dry down to an ambiguous cedar-musk type of base.  It remains crisp and fresh for the 12+ hours it stays on the skin.  La Tulipe is a classic and feminine green floral.  Nice!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="588302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=588302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent164484" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc164484" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cereza"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/27358"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.27358.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cereza" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Farmacia-SS-Annunziata/Vaniglia-del-Madagascar-9584.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.9584.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vaniglia del Madagascar"title="Vaniglia del Madagascar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma164484ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd164484" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/27358">Cereza</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2011-07-13">07/13/11 00:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been very dissapointed with Byredo fragrances before as they are expensive and always lack something to be worth the price tag, but La Tulipe has earned her way in my wishlist.<br />
When I first applied it, I feared that it was to airy, too gentle, but it was marvelously beautiful. It opened crispy green with gentle and feminine freesia, it felt a bit like cold spring morning with wet grass, flowers all around and it smells just lovely. The heart part and the drydown is very similiar - sweet flowers with just tiny bits of vetyver.<br />
The sillage is not great, it stays close to skin, but is very noticable when you let someone close enough, the scent is made to be this way as it is very inviting, sweet and comforting.<br />
The longevity is okay for me, it lasts for 5-6 hours and even if the price tag would ask for a longer lasting time, I find it to be okay.<br />
<br />
A must try for those who love feminine florals.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="164484"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=164484#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1254068" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1254068" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siliaki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1272437"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siliaki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1254068ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1254068" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1272437">Siliaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-11-28">11/28/20 12:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Whenever I wear this people around me ask "where does this smell come from?". A devil in disguise. It's not overwhelmingly sexy, nor mysterious, nor dangerous, nor even classy, yet it attracts people close to you like a magnet. <br />
It's fresh but not at all sporty. It's both warm and breezy and inoccent without being boring. If it were a woman she would have very long light brown hair, walking barefoot in a field of tulips in the first morning hours.  If you like complex perfumes you will hate this. If you like your perfumes bold, stay away. This is linear, straitforward, simple and it smells heavenly</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1254068"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1254068#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1215167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1215167" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="katariina9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/229642"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.229642.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="katariina9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Comme-des-Garcons/Comme-des-Garcons-Series-7-Sweet-Nomad-Tea-4378.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4378.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Comme des Garcons Series 7 Sweet: Nomad Tea"title="Comme des Garcons Series 7 Sweet: Nomad Tea"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1215167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1215167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/229642">katariina9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-08-23">08/23/20 11:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mine is a shameless result of too much time spent in the tax-free part of the airport. Mind you, in the middle of winter, just before Christmas. But who cares if you find your favourite flower, with its meaty leaves, velvety petals, golden heart and slightly sour smell of first spring days, asking to be taken home? I did as ordered. And waited for a few months, until it was perfect time to wear La Tulipe.<br />
<br />
A beauty. Excellent creation by Byredo considering that tulips are the epitomes of spring, yet there are only a few varieties that have fragrant blossoms. Usually its everything else that smells fresh and peppery- bulbs, leaves, stems... La Tulipe captures all of it, plus lasts and projects well. Intoxicating dewy, fresh and feminine. Incredibly authentic-smelling, but not exactly a soliflore- you can also smell hyacinth, freesia and lilac in the background. But it has linear development, which for this particular scent is a huge plus in my book. A must for all the tulip-and spring-flower lovers and one of my favourite Byredos.<br />
<br />
EDIT June 2021: Got the La Tulipe small perfumed oil to go with the scent, and if used decent amount of oil under the perfume, it easily doubles the performance, projects really well like this too. My guess is that Byredo oils are there to extend the longevity and projection, works well, but a bit cheeky considering the total price.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1215167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1215167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="8441" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent234382" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc234382" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="id"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36712"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.36712.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="id" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Violet-Blonde-12767.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.12767.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Violet Blonde"title="Violet Blonde"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma234382ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd234382" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/36712">id</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2012-03-20">03/20/12 08:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>silent soapy floral scent, nice and light but not special enough for me to buy a full bottle. It doesn't smell like tulips. Longevity is good about 7 hours on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="234382"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=234382#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1628551" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1628551" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drinadr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1477755.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drinadr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-68-73990.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.73990.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '68"title="Cheirosa '68"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1628551ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1628551" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1477755">drinadr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-21">08/21/22 17:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Despite the fact that I enjoy floral fragrances, this was not for me. This perfumehas a very strong, almost detergent soapy opening, followed by white freesia and tulip notes. However, the delightful floral scent does not last longand is quickly replaced by a very strong green scent. If you know what I mean, it smells more like atulip leaf and stem than atulip flower. Also, the price is far too high.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1628551"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1628551#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent673284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc673284" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thesheppardess"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770623"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.770623.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="thesheppardess" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma673284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd673284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/770623">thesheppardess</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2016-02-01">02/01/16 09:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fresh, green and eventually freesia. The base notes continue to be pleasant, if somewhat average.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="673284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=673284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent543512" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc543512" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lana148"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/235832"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.235832.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lana148" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Il-Profvmo/Osmo-Scents-Mandarine-7231.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.7231.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Osmo Scents Mandarine"title="Osmo Scents Mandarine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma543512ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd543512" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/235832">Lana148</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2014-11-23">11/23/14 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Happy floral, truly feminine fragrance - fresh, aromatic, little aquatic and sweet.<br />
<br />
This is not tulip only fragrance, so much more going on here, like a large beautiful floral bouquet! I really like this creation, although floral is not my thing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="543512"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=543512#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1524157" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1524157" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Necano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/995080"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Necano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Lady-Vengeance-1715.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1715.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Lady Vengeance"title="Lady Vengeance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1524157ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1524157" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); Not my cup of tea.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="8441"comment_id="1524157"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Byredo/La-Tulipe-8441.html?ccid=1524157#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="8441" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

            </div>
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">56.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Montblanc.html" class="en2inter">Montblanc</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">57.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Le-Labo.html" class="en2inter">Le Labo</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">58.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Zoologist-Perfumes.html" class="en2inter">Zoologist Perfumes</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">59.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
